headline: EPAM Advances Strategic Collaboration Agreement with AWS Focusing on Generative AI
summary: EPAM Systems, Inc. (NYSE: EPAM), a leading digital transformation services and product engineering company, today announced it expanded its strategic collaboration agreement (SCA) with Amazon Web Services (AWS) with a focus on developing generative artificial intelligence (GenAI) solutions to help enterprises more easily migrate workloads to AWS and modernize their applications.
